name: COCONUT LIME
description:
Fragrance Description: A luscious blend of juicy citrus fruits such as lemon and lime on a delicate heart of creamy coconut and fresh florals.
Vanilla notes and sandalwood round out the blend. Our Scented Candles are handmade in Geelong, using the highest quality soy wax and natural cotton wicks.

Large Candles: 680grams with an average 80-hour burn time

Small Candles: 480grams with an average 65-hour burn time

Melts: $1.00 each. Recommended usage is 3-4 melts, which provides an average 12 hours of burn time

Tips: To get the most out of your candles burn them for 1-4 hours at a time. Make sure you trip the wick after every burn. Our reusable jars are perfect for storing cotton buds or spices.

name: FALLING LEAVES
